QuestData.Title: Stealing Their Thunder King
QuestData.Description: Our only hope is to find the Thunder King's remains before they do. He must be buried within the Tomb of Conquerors.$b$bGetting to his remains will not be easy, $n. The tomb will no doubt be defended by guardians and other unfriendly surprises intended to ward off thieves.$b$bOnce inside we will need to figure out where his remains have actually been placed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Find the Bottom Fragment of Lei Shen's Tablet and restore the Tablet of Thunder.
QuestData.CompletionText: Have you figured out where the Thunder King's remains are hidden?
QuestData.RewardText: We are fortunate they haven't gotten to Lei Shen's remains... yet.$b$bThe Zandalari will not give up until they have what they want.
